summary.span: 指示各线程的静态字段值是否唯一。

span.span: Indicates that the value of a static field is unique for each thread.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个`static`字段标记有线程间不共享。A `static` field marked with is not shared between threads. 每个执行线程具有单独的实例的字段中，独立设置并为该字段获取值。Each executing thread has a separate instance of the field, and independently sets and gets values for that field. 如果在另一个线程访问该字段，则它将包含不同的值。If the field is accessed on a different thread, it will contain a different value. 请注意，除了应用属性到字段，还必须定义其作为`static`字段 （在 C# 中) 或`Shared`字段 （在 Visual Basic)。Note that in addition to applying the attribute to a field, you must also define it as a `static` field (in C#) or a `Shared` field (in Visual Basic). > [!NOTE] > 请勿为使用标记字段指定初始值`ThreadStaticAttribute`，因为只有一次，当类构造函数执行，并因此影响只有一个线程将发生此类初始化。Do not specify initial values for fields marked with `ThreadStaticAttribute`, because such initialization occurs only once, when the class constructor executes, and therefore affects only one thread. 如果不指定一个初始值，您可以借助正在初始化为其默认值，如果它是值类型，或该字段`null`如果它是引用类型。If you do not specify an initial value, you can rely on the field being initialized to its default value if it is a value type, or to `null` if it is a reference type. 使用此属性，因为它是，和从其派生。Use this attribute as it is, and do not derive from it. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的示例实例化的随机数生成器，创建 10 个线程除了主线程，然后在每个线程中生成两个亿个随机数字。The following example instantiates a random number generator, creates ten threads in addition to the main thread, and then generates two million random numbers in each thread. 它使用属性来计算每个线程的随机数字的个数和之和。It uses the attribute to calculate the sum and the count of random numbers per thread. 它还定义了两个附加的每个线程字段`previous`和`abnormal`，这样，以检测损坏的随机数生成器。It also defines two additional per-thread fields, `previous` and `abnormal`, that allows it to detect corruption of the random number generator. [!code-csharp[System.ThreadStaticAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threadstaticattribute/cs/threadsafe2a.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.ThreadStaticAttribute#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threadstaticattribute/vb/threadsafe2a.vb#1)] 该示例使用`lock`C# 中的语句和`SyncLock`构造在 Visual Basic 中的随机数字生成器对访问进行同步。The example uses the `lock` statement in C# and the `SyncLock` construct in Visual Basic to synchronize access to the random number generator. 这可以防止损坏的随机数生成器，这通常会在其返回值为零的所有后续调用。This prevents corruption of the random number generator, which typically results in its returning a value of zero for all subsequent calls. 此示例还使用类，以确保每个线程已完成生成随机数字，然后再显示的调用总数。The example also uses the class to ensure that each thread has finished generating random numbers before it displays the total number of calls. 否则，如果主线程完成之前它会生成的其他线程的执行，它会显示方法调用的总数不准确的值。Otherwise, if the main thread completes execution before the additional threads that it spawns, it displays an inaccurate value for the total number of method calls.
